name: If you shat in a bowl of rice crispies would it go snap crackle poop
name_original: If you shat in a bowl of rice crispies would it go snap crackle poop
description:
I made this on a zoom call with a friend while laughing my head off 

Enjoy this piece of horror.

"H m.. I don't know." -Friend.

"DON'T ACTUALLY WRITE THAT DON'T ACTUALLY WRITE THAT." -Same friend

"Did you actually write that :(" -Again, same friend

"I'm worried." -The friend

"Thank you very much :D" -Friendo

"I give up- L I F E" -Friendneddecdedhcefwgfiulcgydsriyewdfucgsnf ,

"I give up on life*" -Friend, I'm sorry ;m;
